name: RUN
description: This command is a TAS Professional 3.0 command here for compatibility. The preferred method is to use the CHAIN command. It runs a TAS Professional 5.1 program that must have been previously compiled. You can specify the path if desired, otherwise, it should reside in your current sub-directory.

parameters.name: program_name
parameters.description: This is the name of the TAS Professional 5.1 program to be run. It must have been previously compiled. You can specify the path if desired, otherwise, it should reside in your current sub-directory.

comments: This is the equivalent of the TAS Professional 3.0 command Run.
